attributes.action: take firm action to obtain the release of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gillian Gibbons has been sentenced to imprisonment for her "crime" of allowing children to name a teddy bear Mohammed. The PM should
a) sever all diplomatic ties with Sudan,
b) stop all aid to Sudan, and
c) dismiss the Sudanese ambassador and requisition the Sudanese embassy.

This would be instead of pussy-footing around the situation because of the risk of offending Muslims.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
